WorkItem.Description:
Using the markup below, the context menu is not shown on a right click if the ShinyBlue theme is applied.  If the default theme or expression light theme is used, it does appear.
 
    <ContextMenu x:Key="EntrantCommands">
        <MenuItem Header="A" />
        <MenuItem Header="B" />
        <MenuItem Header="C" />
    </ContextMenu>
    
    <DataTemplate x:Key="EntrantsTemplate" DataType="{x:Type local:Entrant}">
            <TextBlock ContextMenu="{StaticResource EntrantCommands}">Dummy</TextBlock>
    </DataTemplate>
 
<HierarchicalDataTemplate x:Key="StartDetailTemplate" DataType="{x:Type local:Start}" 
                                  ItemsSource="{Binding Path=Entrants}"
                                  ItemTemplate="{StaticResource  EntrantsTemplate}">
        <TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=StartTime}" />
    </HierarchicalDataTemplate>
   
 
<TreeView  HorizontalAlignment="Stretch"  Name="treeViewRacing2" VerticalAlignment="Stretch" 
                       ItemsSource="{Binding Path=RunningStarts}" ItemTemplate="{StaticResource StartDetailTemplate}"/>
WorkItem.Summary: Shiny Blue breaks TreeView context menu
